description:
Wathitdew Record™ presents a new turn-based arcade fighting game that brings together four universes from Wathitdew™ Game Studio franchises in an epic clash!

This turn-based JRPG-style battle game features a total of 20 playable characters and 12 stages, including unlockables. Dive into a variety of game modes, such as Classic Mode, Quick Game, and Boss Rush, or explore the Adventure Mode with a one-hour storyline that introduces a brand new antagonist. Activate the speedrun timer and challenge yourself to beat your best time in Adventure Mode!

Immerse yourself in the rich lore of each character and stage in the History & Information section, where official data from all the games has been compiled for your discovery.

Earn rank XP and credits by playing through the different modes and completing the 12 challenges that reward you with in-game bonuses. Unlock 10 hidden achievements and use credits to purchase items that will assist you across various game modes. Characters and stages from the four franchises: Adventure Field™, PROJECT: KNIGHT™, Aeternum Quest™, and Shadow Fear™ Path to Insanity await your arrival in battle!
name: Wathitdew Record™ Game Studio BATTLEFIELD
